move_speed.name: Move speed
move_speed.description: Move speed only affects keyboard movement (WSAD)

initial_zoom.name: Initial zoom
initial_zoom.description: Zoom level at the start of the game. The lower the value the bigger the the zoom

zoom_speed.name: Zoom speed
zoom_speed.description: Zoom speed only affects keyboard zoom (Z or X)

zoom_sensitivity.name: Zoom sensitivity
zoom_sensitivity.description: Zoom sensitivity only affects mouse scroll zoom speed

growth.name: Food growth speed
growth.description: Probability that a tree will get a new apple each frame

hunger_decrease.name: Hunger removal
hunger_decrease.description: How much hunger will be removed after eating one item of food.

max_person_age.name: Max person age
max_person_age.description: Each person will die after that many turns. 0 means that people do not die of old age.

person_ttl.name: Person TTL
person_ttl.description: How many frames to wait until removing dead person entity from game

food_for_baby.name: Food for baby
food_for_baby.description: Person has to have double amount of this to create a baby. He will give this amount to it when its born

year_length.name: Year length
year_length.description: How many frames are in one year

growing_season_length.name: Growing season length
growing_season_length.description: How many frames are in one growing season

death_lottery.name: Death lottery
death_lottery.description: If checked a random person will inherit all food after someone dies. Otherwise the food goes to waste.

min_fertile_age_male.name: Min fertile male age
min_fertile_age_male.description: How much % of max age a male person must live to start being fertile

max_fertile_age_male.name: Max fertile male age
max_fertile_age_male.description: How much % of max age a male person must live to stop being fertile

min_fertile_age_female.name: Min fertile female age
min_fertile_age_female.description: How much % of max age a female person must live to start being fertile

max_fertile_age_female.name: Min fertile male age
max_fertile_age_female.description: How much % of max age a female person must live to stop being fertile

geometry.name: Geometry type
geometry.description: Torus - map is a torus, so the edges are connected. FlatEarth - you know it. RingVertical - vertically connected edges. RingHorizontal - horizontally connected edges

tree_tile_probability.name: Tree tile %
tree_tile_probability.description: How many tiles will be generates as trees (randomly)

food_amount_goal.name: Food amount goal
food_amount_goal.description: Food amount at which the actor does not care about food at all

food_amount_threshold.name: Food amount threshold
food_amount_threshold.description: Each actor will try to have goal * threshold of food around with them

vision_range.name: Vision range
vision_range.description: How many tiles the actor can see. They only look directly left, right, up and down

plot_time_range.name: Plot time range
plot_time_range.description: How many frames to show on the plot

age_histogram_bins.name: Age histogram bins
age_histogram_bins.description: How many bins to use for age histogram. 10 is a good value. Boxes will be split evenly
